name: The Trolley Problem
description: This bandit is far more traditional. He had tied five people to one track, and a single person to the other. If you do nothing, five will die. However, if you interfere, you can kill one to save five. What will you do?

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: Five Humans are tied down on the route of this oncoming train. Will you condemn someone else to death in order to save them?

options.name: Human-Sparce Track
options.description: A single human is tied to the track. Will it be their unfortunate fate to take the train heading for their compatriots. Only you can decide.
